snippet.title: Sclash early trailer
snippet.description:
Sclash is a plug’n play samurai fighting game full of tension where one hit means death.

Play as an experimented samurai with easy to execute actions for everyone. Breath and take time to anticipate your next moves and your enemy’s ones in large maps.
Manage well your stamina to land a deadly hit to your opponent.

___________________________________________________________________

Sclash is currently in development and aimed to be released in the second half of 2020 on Steam and Itch.io.

TRY THE DEMO :
- Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1284130/Sclash/
- Itch.io : https://kaldrin.itch.io/sclash
- Indiexpo : https://www.indiexpo.net/en/games/sclash

WEBSITE : http://sclashthegame.com/

Wishlist Sclash on steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1284130/Sclash/

FOLLOW THE MAKING ON SOCIAL MEDIAS
- Twitter : https://twitter.com/SclashTheGame
- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/sclashthegame/
- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/SclashTheGame/
- LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/company/sclash

And join our Discord to chat with the developers and have exclusive infos, roles, events, playtests...
https://discord.gg/28Sqdnt
